name: Computer Lab
description: Advanced computing lab with high-performance systems for programming and research.
voice_navigation: The Computer Lab is located in the Science Block near the central pathway.

name: Zoology Lab
description: Equipped laboratory for biological specimen study and research.
voice_navigation: The Zoology Lab is inside the Life Sciences building.

name: Botany Lab
description: Plant research and botanical experiment laboratory.
voice_navigation: The Botany Lab is located beside the Zoology department.

name: Library
description: Central academic library with extensive research and reference materials.
voice_navigation: Walk straight along the main road to reach the central library.

name: Bishop Heber Chapel
description: Historic chapel serving as a peaceful prayer and reflection space.
voice_navigation: Enter the chapel grounds located near the old academic block.

name: MCC Campus Clinic
description: On-campus medical clinic providing first aid and health support.
voice_navigation: The medical clinic is located near the administrative block.

name: MCC Cafeteria
description: Main student cafeteria offering meals and refreshments.
voice_navigation: The cafeteria is near the Union Society building.

name: Healthy Cafeteria
description: Dedicated healthy meal cafeteria with fresh options.
voice_navigation: The healthy cafeteria is adjacent to the main canteen.

name: MCC Indoor Stadium
description: Indoor stadium for basketball, badminton and indoor events.
voice_navigation: The indoor stadium is located in the South Campus sports zone.

name: Outdoor Playground
description: Large outdoor playground for football and athletic activities.
voice_navigation: The outdoor playground is beside the indoor stadium.

name: Main Gate
description: Primary entrance of the campus connecting to Tambaram Main Road.
voice_navigation: Start your campus journey from the Main Gate.
